copilot.general.sourceControl.customized: The first line should be summary of no more than 50 characters starting with classification of commit from: `CHORE:`|`FIX:`|`FEATURE:`|`BREAKING CHANGE:`|`TESTS:`|`SECURITY:`|`COMPLEX:`. The second line should be blank. The following lines should be the full summary as a bullet list using `-`. Any summary item that is security related should start with `SECURITY:`. Any summary item change that causes a breaking change to a feature/interface/dependency should start with `BREAKING CHANGE:`
